README
setup parameter contexts

1- dbConnectionUrl : (default = jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432)
2- dbName : (default = crypto)
3- dbTable : (default = crypto_details)
3- dbUser : (default = postgres)
4- dbPass : (default = postgres)
5- jdbcDriver : (default = my jdbc driver path :))

other parameters doesn't need to change
